definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
to steam/to cook in a steamer/to reheat cold food by steaming it
to distill/to break a liquid substance up into components by boiling

sentences.english: The technologies and processes available to manufacture these products are by fractionation, hydrogenation and interesterification .
sentences.chinese: 该技术和工艺可以生产这些产品的分馏，加氢和交换。

sentences.english: Fermentation required only a day, and fractionation was not complicated.
sentences.chinese: 发酵只需要一天，分馏并不复杂。

sentences.english: The vibration of fractionator was eliminated by decoking the oil gas line.
sentences.chinese: 对油气线进行消焦处理后，分馏塔振动被消除。

sentences.english: Excess organics tax ozonation and foam fractionating systems.
sentences.chinese: 多余的有机物税臭氧和泡沫分馏系统。

sentences.english: Noise of air seperation plant mainly comes from air compressor and fractional venting system.
sentences.chinese: 空分装置的噪声主要来自空压机组和分馏放空系统。

sentences.english: Migration fractionation can form derived condensate and residual oil.
sentences.chinese: 运移分馏作用可以产生衍生凝析油和残余油。

sentences.english: A new method establishing models of FCC main fractionator was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种新的催化裂化主分馏塔建模方法。

sentences.english: Also, it is discussed about the role of organic acid on fractionation.
sentences.chinese: 同时，探讨了弱有机酸的存在对轻重稀土分馏的影响。

sentences.english: The heavy materials are fractionated to the bottom of the column.
sentences.chinese: 重的物质被分馏至塔底。

sentences.english: This is known as vacuum fractionation .
sentences.chinese: 这就是所谓的真空分馏。

sentences.english: This article discusses the main components fractionation Tata- Tray optimal design.
sentences.chinese: 论述了分馏塔塔主要零部件一塔板的优化设计举例。

sentences.english: Changes in contents of carbazoles and its isomers indicate that there exists an obvious migration fractionation.
sentences.chinese: 沿油气运移方面，咔唑类化合物具有明显的分馏效应。

definition: fraction (of a distillate)/key (one component part of a distillate)
